text: Uncommon Valor is a 1983 American action movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and starring Gene Hackman, Patrick Swayze, Robert Stack, Fred Ward, Tim Thomerson, Reb Brown, Randall "Tex" Cobb, Gail Strickland, Jane Kaczmarek, Reb Brown . It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 action movies Category:1983 war movies Category:American action movies Category:American war movies Category:Vietnam War movies Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Houston
title: Uncommon Valor
